Env: START=qemu-system-x86_64 -net nic -net user,id=n0,hostfwd=tcp::3389-:3389 -m {{RAM}}G -smp cores={{CORE}} -cpu qemu64,+avx,+avx2,+sse,+sse2,+sse4.1,+sse4.2,hv-relaxed -boot order=d -drive file=2012r2.img,format=raw,if=virtio -device usb-ehci,id=usb,bus=pci.0,addr=0x4 -device usb-tablet -vnc :0 -vga virtio -device virtio-gpu
Name: Windows 2012r2 Datnguyentv
Description: File Img W2012 của đạt nguyễn vn
Author: SNIPA VN | https://youtube.com@snipavn205
